participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Mike enjoys exploring new experiences with friends.
participant_1.background: I love going to farmer's markets with my friends because we can explore new foods and find fresh produce. I like crab dipped in butter. I keep my clothes clean but my Renaissance Faire outfit is a special case. I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job. When I'm not touring with the band, I like to garden.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Reflective and nurturing, Jessica values family time and loves sharing her creativity with students.
participant_2.background: I took a long break and reevaluated my priorities. Every day is a sweet taco-filled adventure. I have a little sister. My favorite singer is Jess Greenberg. I work as an English teacher.

content.text: Hello! My name is Jessica. What's yours?
Hi Jessica, I'm Mike. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! Just got back from a long break.
Oh that sounds nice. What did you do during your break?
I reevaluated my priorities and spent a lot of time with my family.
That sounds like a great idea. I'm sure your family was happy to see you.
They were! I'm also happy to be back to work. I love my job as an English teacher.
That's great! I'm sure your students are happy to have you back.
They seem to be. I'm excited to start the new school year.
I'm sure it will be a great year!
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it
